message: Hey im wondering if there is a way for me to utilize the convore API to display and power discussions on my webapp? i know theres a burden of signing up (is that possible to bypass somehow? signup with twitter or something?) i want basically to build streams of content for users around topics.
You can easily built a convore client on top of your site
It sounds like you're willing to dive into our API and use that, if so then we *definitely* support that use case.
@aloncarmel If you run into any problems, let us know and we'll try to sort them out
